Posted By: Snaxme (12/26/2009 2:00:48 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Because nobody seems to have pointed it out, if you put the flavourtexts in this order:  
1. [Creature Guy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Creature Guy)  
2. [Save Life](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Save Life)  
3. [Deal Damage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Deal Damage)  
4. [Spell Counter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spell Counter)  
5. [Kill Destroy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kill Destroy)  
  
You get a nice little rhyme:  
"There once was a player named Quinn, who consistently managed to win. Until he got singed, playing *Unhinged*, getting Gotcha'd again and again."
posts.html:
Because nobody seems to have pointed it out, if you put the flavourtexts in this order:
1. Creature Guy
2. Save Life
3. Deal Damage
4. Spell Counter
5. Kill Destroy

You get a nice little rhyme:
"There once was a player named Quinn, who consistently managed to win. Until he got singed, playing Unhinged, getting Gotcha'd again and again."

Posted By: marmaris74 (6/29/2011 3:11:44 PM)

posts.post_content:
"I gain 8 life with [rest for the weary](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=rest for the weary)."
  
   
"Gotcha!"
  
   
"Hey, I was telling you that I gained life!"
  
   
A few turns later...
  
   
"Hey, you just gained ![Variable Colorless](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=X&type=symbol) life with a [stream of life](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=stream of life) and didn't tell me!"
  
   
"I didn't tell you I gained life because - "
  
   
"GOTCHA!!!!!"
posts.html:
"I gain 8 life with rest for the weary."

"Gotcha!"

"Hey, I was telling you that I gained life!"

A few turns later...

"Hey, you just gained life with a stream of life and didn't tell me!"

"I didn't tell you I gained life because - "

"GOTCHA!!!!!"
